original: intros p Hp Zp_plus Zp Zp_ring_ring_lemma1 Zp_ring_ring_lemma2 Zp_prime_invert. unfold monoid_theory, Zp_plus. split. - intros x y. unfold Z_Zp. simpl. destruct x as [x Hx], y as [y Hy]. apply (ex_intro (fun x0 : nat => x0 < p) (rem (x + y) p)). apply div_rem_spec2. apply Hp. - intros x y z. simpl. unfold Z_Zp in *. destruct x as [x Hx], y as [y Hy], z as [z Hz]. apply (ex_intro (fun x0 : nat => x0 < p) (rem (rem x p + rem y p) p)). apply rem_plus.
